column4: Total No. of Cases for Investigation Including Pending Cases from previous year (Col.4)
column6: No. of Cases in which Investigation Refused (Col.6)
column7: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False / Mistake of Fact or Law Etc. (Col.7)
column8: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col.8)
column9: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Charge Sheets Submitted (Col.9)
column10: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Total (Col.10) = Col.{(7) + (8) + (9) }
column11: No. of Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the year (Col.11)
column13: Percentage of Pendency to All India Total (Col.13)
